description:
This is a market on whether Emin Gün Sirer (@el33th4xor) or Do Kwon (@stablekwon) will have a larger Twitter follower count for February 12, 2022, 12:00:00PM ET. This market will resolve to "Emin Gün Sirer" if the Twitter account for Emin Gün Sirer, whatever its @ is on the resolution date, (presently at @el33th4xor), has a higher follower count than Do Kwon's Twitter account (presently @stablekwon) when checked on February 12, 2022, 12:00:00 PM ET. If Do Kwon's Twitter account has a higher follower count than Emin Gün Sirer's on the resolution date, this market will resolve to "Do Kwon".

The resolution source for this market will be each Twitter account's follower count according to tweetdeck.twitter.com at the resolution time. However other credible sources, including the follower count available on each account's official Twitter page, will also suffice.

If one Twitter account is deactivated on the resolution date and the other remains online, this market will resolve as the active Twitter account. If both Twitter accounts are deactivated on the resolution date, this market will resolve to 50-50. If both Twitter accounts have an equal number of followers this market will resolve to 50-50.


Additional Market Information:

- To see the official cumulative tweet count on the resolution source, search the resolution source for the @el33th4xor or @stablekwon Twitter account, and check the cumulative numbers of tweets under the “TWEETS” field.

- Neither any authorized user of the accounts in question need to be the author of any such tweets, nor must any authorized user maintain control of the account.

events.title: Will Emin Gun Sirer or Do Kwon have more Twitter followers on February 12th, 2022?

question: Will Emin Gun Sirer or Do Kwon have more Twitter followers on February 12th, 2022?
